basic_info.name: Liliane Bettencourt
basic_info.summary: Liliane Henriette Charlotte Bettencourt (French pronunciation: [liljan ɑ̃ʁjɛt ʃaʁlɔt bɛtɑ̃kuʁ]; née Schueller; 21 October 1922 – 21 September 2017) was a French heiress, socialite and businesswoman. She was a board member and one of the principal shareholders of L'Oréal. At the time of her death, she was the richest woman, and the 14th richest person in the world, with a net worth of US$44.3 billion.

quotes.text: Mrs. Bettencourt was ready for 'nuclear war' with her daughter.
ward off all conflict between Liliane Bettencourt and Françoise Bettencourt-Meyers.
